<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healing Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=1595) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive 2" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=4" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per round

**Trigger**
You craft an [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) using [Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2), and that elixir is at least 2 levels lower than your advanced alchemy level.

</column>

---

By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile. You grant the elixir the [bomb](/Traits.aspx?ID=21) trait. If you throw an elixir of life bomb at a willing target, you hit even on a failure, though not on a critical failure. If your Strike with this elixir bomb hits a living target, the target regains Hit Points as if it had consumed the elixir. On a critical success, the target also gains the elixir's item bonus to saving throws against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) for 1 minute.
name: Healing Bomb
